snippet: YOUCHAH--Marjorie, died April 6, 2016, after a brief illness, in Las Vegas, NV with her daughters by her side. A 60 year resident of Peter Cooper Village/Stuyvesant Town, she will be remembered for her love of community, the beach, and the New York Yankees. She will be missed every day. 1/3
lead_paragraph: YOUCHAH--Marjorie, died April 6, 2016, after a brief illness, in Las Vegas, NV with her daughters by her side. A 60 year resident of Peter Cooper Village/Stuyvesant Town, she will be remembered for her love of community, the beach, and the New York Yankees. She will be missed every day. 1/3
